text: Eupterote decolorata is a moth in the family Eupterotidae. It was described by Karl Grünberg in 1914. It is found in Assam, India.Nässig, W. A. (1995): Revisional notes on Philippine Eupterotidae: Sarmalia Walker 1866 another new synonym of Eupterote Hübner, 1822 (Lepidoptera: Eupterotidae). Nachrichten des Entomologischen Vereins Apollo, Frankfurt am Main, Supplement 14: 119–124. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1914 Category:Eupterotinae
title: Eupterote decolorata
